snippet: Brian Brooks Moving Company’s “Big City” has its New York premiere at the Gotham Dance Festival.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews premiere of Big City and other dance pieces performed by the Brian Brooks Moving Company at the Joyce Theater, as part of the Gotham Dance Festival.
lead_paragraph: Brian Brooks Moving Company’s “Big City” has its New York premiere at the Gotham Dance Festival.

headline.seo: ‘Big City’ by Brian Brooks Moving Company
headline.main: A Storm’s Aftermath, Lost in the City
headline.print_headline: A Storm’s Aftermath, Lost in the City
